meanings.sent1: I telefaxed the contract to the client yesterday.
meanings.sent2: She telefaxed the report to the head office for review.
meanings.sent3: The cat telefaxed a message to the dog, asking for a playdate.
meanings.sent4: His words were telefaxed across the room, reaching everyone instantly.
meanings.sent5: The urgent message was telefaxed, ensuring quick delivery.

meanings.sent1: They telefaxed the important memo to all employees.
meanings.sent2: The secretary telefaxed the letter to the recipient.
meanings.sent3: The robot telefaxed a love letter to the toaster, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The news was telefaxed to the world, spreading like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The map was telefaxed to the explorers, guiding their journey.
